definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: If want to buy expensive clothing words, direct bother. i can go.
sentences.chinese: 如果想买名贵服装的话，直接去就行了。

sentences.english: Dendrobium officinale is a precious traditional Chinese herbal medicine which belongs to Dendrobium species, Orchidaceae.
sentences.chinese: 铁皮石斛为兰科石斛属植物，是一种名贵的药用植物。

sentences.english: Villagers on grassland have kept expensive pet dog.
sentences.chinese: 《不怒自威》草原上的村民，也养起了名贵的宠物犬。

sentences.english: Cordyceps sinensis is a famous and nourishing herb in traditional Chinese medicine.
sentences.chinese: 冬虫夏草为名贵滋补药。

sentences.english: This paper introduces research process of sacrificial red on famous traditional high-temperature coloured glazes ;
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了对传统名贵高温颜色釉祭红的研制过程。

sentences.english: Lily's brooch looks exquisite. It must be very precious.
sentences.chinese: 丽丽的胸饰很别致，看得出来是个名贵的东西。

sentences.english: admittedly, knowledge gained from books is also valuable and the more the better.
sentences.chinese: 诚然，来自书册上的常识也是名贵的，并且越多越好。

sentences.english: France is the most expensive dish Egan, the dishes are fried steak plus potatoes wire.
sentences.chinese: 法国最名贵的菜是鹅肝，家常菜是炸牛排外加土豆丝。

sentences.english: "He is, as you see, a very valuable animal, " said Maximilian.
sentences.chinese: “你看，它是一匹非常名贵的牲口，”马西米兰说。

sentences.english: Noble tree is a favorite material for the work of many sculptors.
sentences.chinese: 名贵的树木是雕塑家最喜欢的工作材料。

sentences.english: Want to wear a ton of Tiffany every day?
sentences.chinese: 想不想每天都身带名贵沉重的Tiffany？

sentences.english: In the past, Huaiyang Cuisine was known for its high price.
sentences.chinese: 在过去淮杨菜就是以名贵著称的。

sentences.english: "South bead " originate in Guangxi Gepu county, it is the rarest pearl on the world.
sentences.chinese: “南珠”产于广西合浦县，是世界上最名贵的珍珠。

sentences.english: Radix ophiopogonis as medicine are expensive, volatile oils are the main active ingredient radix ophiopogonis.
sentences.chinese: 麦冬是名贵中药，挥发油是麦冬的主要活性成分。

sentences.english: Wintersweet (Chimonanthus praecox Link), native to China, is one of the famous and precious woody plants with a long cultivation history.
sentences.chinese: 蜡梅特产中国，是栽培历史悠久的名贵花木。

sentences.english: New age travelers kidnap the prized dog of a Bristol Antiques dealer, with dire consequences.
sentences.chinese: 绑匪绑架了古董商的名贵狗，但却引来了可怕的后果。

definition: a rare treasure/sth priceless and unique
